leap_teleop.py
Go to the documentation of this file.
1 #!/usr/bin/env python
2 
3 ## @package leap_teleop
4 # @date 19-02-2019
5 # @authors Nicolas Dejon and Adam Berka
6 # @brief Leap Motion Teleoperation
7 # @details Script that sends the raw yaw, pitch and roll angles in degrees to the /orientation topic.@n
8 # It also converts the leap motion data into Twist messages by a defined hand-gesture in order to teleoperate the simulated robot turtlesim
9 
10 import rospy
11 import math
12 from leap_motion.msg import leap
13 from leap_motion.msg import leapros
14 from geometry_msgs.msg import Twist
15 from my_msgs.msg import RPY
16 
17 ## Topic used by turtlesim
18 teleop_topic = '/turtle1/cmd_vel' # For use with turtlesim
19 ## Topic used by the common controller
20 orientation_topic ='/orientation' # For use with controller
21 
22 # Change values according to leap motion calibration
23 ## Robot value for backward move
24 low_speed = -0.5
25 ## Robot value for stopping
26 stop_speed = 0
27 ## Robot value for forward move
28 high_speed = 0.5
29 
30 ## Robot value for turning right
31 low_turn = -0.5
32 ## Robot value for stopping turn
33 stop_turn = 0
34 ## Robot value for turning left
35 high_turn = 0.5
36 
37 ## Start of range for detecting low pitch
38 pitch_low_range = -20
39 ## Start of range for detecting high pitch
40 pitch_high_range = 20
41 
42 
43 ## Start of range for detecting roll right
44 roll_low_range = -50
45 ## Start of range for detecting roll left
46 roll_high_range = 80
47 
48 ## Sends the raw incoming yaw, pitch and roll angles from the Leap Motion to the /orientation topic
49 def sendOrientation(yaw,pitch,roll):
50  # Publish Roll/Pitch/Yaw
51  orientation = RPY()
52  orientation.roll = roll; orientation.pitch = pitch; orientation.yaw = yaw;
53  pub_orientation.publish(orientation)
54  #rospy.loginfo(rospy.get_name() + ": Yaw %s" % yaw + ": Pitch %s" % pitch + ": Roll %s" % roll)
55  #rospy.loginfo("\n")
56 
57 ## Interprets the received yaw, pitch and roll into user-defined hand gestures that controls
58 # the simulated robot turltesim by sending Twist messages
59 def sendTeleop(yaw,pitch,roll):
60  # Just sending Twist messages
61  twist = Twist()
62 
63  twist.linear.x = 0; twist.linear.y = 0; twist.linear.z = 0
64  twist.angular.x = 0; twist.angular.y = 0; twist.angular.z = 0
65 
66  if(pitch < pitch_low_range and pitch > pitch_low_range - 30 ):
67  twist.linear.x = high_speed; twist.linear.y = 0; twist.linear.z = 0
68  twist.angular.x = 0; twist.angular.y = 0; twist.angular.z = 0
69  #rospy.loginfo("Pitch low")
70 
71  elif(pitch > pitch_high_range and pitch < pitch_high_range + 30):
72  twist.linear.x = 0; twist.linear.y = 0; twist.linear.z = 0
73  twist.angular.x = 0; twist.angular.y = 0; twist.angular.z = 0
74  #rospy.loginfo("Pitch high")
75 
76 
77  if(roll > roll_high_range and roll < roll_high_range + 50):
78  twist.linear.x = 0; twist.linear.y = 0; twist.linear.z = 0
79  twist.angular.x = 0; twist.angular.y = 0; twist.angular.z = high_turn
80  #rospy.loginfo("Roll left")
81 
82 
83  elif(roll < roll_low_range and roll > roll_low_range - 50):
84  twist.linear.x = 0; twist.linear.y = 0; twist.linear.z = 0
85  twist.angular.x = 0; twist.angular.y = 0; twist.angular.z = low_turn
86  #rospy.loginfo("Roll right")
87 
88 
89  pub_teleop.publish(twist) # Publish the Twist messages to the turtlesim
90 
91 ## Callback of the ROS subscriber to send the orientation messages to the controller
92 # and the Twist messages to control the robot
93 def callback_ros(data):
94 
95  msg = leapros() # Get the messages from the Leap Motion
96  msg = data
97 
98  yaw = msg.ypr.z
99  pitch = msg.ypr.y
100  roll = msg.ypr.x
101 
102  sendOrientation(yaw,pitch,roll)
103  sendTeleop(yaw,pitch,roll) # Comment this line if you are not using turtlesim
104 
105 
106 ## Listens to leapmotion/data and starts ROS spin
107 def listener():
108  global pub_teleop, pub_orientation
109  rospy.init_node('leap_sub', anonymous=True)
110  rospy.Subscriber("leapmotion/data", leapros, callback_ros)
111  pub_teleop = rospy.Publisher(teleop_topic, Twist, queue_size=1)
112  pub_orientation = rospy.Publisher(orientation_topic, RPY, queue_size=1)
113 
114  rospy.spin()
115 
116 ## Main is main
117 if __name__ == '__main__':
118  listener()
